rules.description: Ctrl+D Opt+D to Forward delete, Opt+Shf+D to Opt+Forward delete
Ctl+K/Opt+G to kill all line and put into clipboard
Ctl+A/E to Home/End, Opt+Shf+J/L to Home/End
Opt+N to Cmd+Up, Opt+Shf+N to Cmd+Down
Opt+F to Backward delete, Opt+Shf+F to Opt+Backward delete
J+K at the same time to Esc
Ctl+D Opt+D to Forward delete, Opt+Shf+D to Opt+Forward delete
Opt+F to Backward delete, Opt+Shf+F to Opt+Backward delete
Ctl+A/E to Home/End, Opt+Shf+J/L to Home/End
Opt+N to Cmd+Up, Opt+Shf+N to Cmd+Down
Ctl+K/Opt+G to kill all line and put into clipboard
J+K at the same time to Esc
